Name: Constâncio
description:
Constâncio was born in Maputo Province, is 49 years old, and is a carpenter by profession as well as a farmer. He lives with his partner and family in a house he owns.
This is his first request for a loan, and with the money he intends to buy a motorized pump to improve irrigation on his plot of land.
His greatest dreams are to increase the production on his plot of land and to improve his living conditions.
